programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Lions look for revenge in their traditional Thanksgiving tussle as they host the rival Packers. This is their NFL-leading 23rd matchup on the holiday, with Detroit boasting a 12-9-1 record. Green Bay started the season by defeating Detroit 27-13.

programme.title: Live: NFL Thanksgiving Thursday Football: Pregame
programme.desc: Pregame coverage of NFL Thanksgiving game.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Chiefs visit the Cowboys for a Thanksgiving Day duel. Dallas sports a 34-22-1 all-time Thanksgiving record, with three straight wins on the holiday. Kansas City last featured in the spot on the inaugural Thursday Night Football broadcast in 2006.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The NFL's three-game Thanksgiving Day slate comes to an end with the Bengals facing the AFC North rival Ravens. Baltimore has won all four meetings since Cincinnati's 24-17 triumph in a 2022 AFC wild-card match. Cincy won on Thursday night in Week 7.

programme.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang is grappling with the consequences of his choices as both a superhero and a father. Approached by Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym, Lang must once again don the Ant-Man suit and fight alongside the Wasp. The urgent mission soon leads to secret revelations from the past as the dynamic duo find themselves in an epic battle against a powerful new enemy.

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
programme.desc: Ant-Man and the Wasp find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that pushes them beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun hits Milwaukee for family, craft beer and a monster appetite for massive meals.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun Strowman hits Washington, D.C. hungry, seeking victory-worthy bites across the nation's capital.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun tackles Orlando eats with a roast beef icon and a showdown with the menu.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Anton Black dies while being taken into police custody, the community seeks justice; a yearlong "Dateline" investigation looks at the officer at the center of the case and missed warning signs.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The discovery of an Army captain's death in her El Paso, Texas, home shakes her tight-knit military community.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a woman is abducted during her evening shift at a gift shop, her family keeps the case in the public eye for decades, until investigators finally solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a woman is abducted during her evening shift at a gift shop, her family keeps the case in the public eye for decades, until investigators finally solve the mystery.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: While opening a safety deposit box at a local bank, NCIS Special Agent Kensi Blye is shot after three armed assailants enter and hold everyone in the building hostage.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a lieutenant, which appears to be suicide; Nate joins Kensi in the field.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious n

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group o

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air,

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Without the guidance and protection of their professors, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson) begin a mission to destroy the Horcruxes, the sources of Voldemort's immortality. Though they must rely on one another more than ever, dark forces threaten to tear them apart. Voldemort's Death Eaters have seized control of the Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts, and they ar

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: A clash between good and evil awaits as young Harry, Ron and Hermione prepare for a final battle against Lord Voldemort. Harry has grown into a steely lad on a mission to rid the world of evil. The friends must search for the Horcruxes that keep the dastardly wizard immortal. Harry and Voldemort meet at Hogwarts Castle for a showdown where the forces of darkness may finally meet their match.
